isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Bunk Fluorescent And Reading Lights With PRO SLEEPER

svcproc.title: Bunk Fluorescent And Reading Lights With PRO SLEEPER
svcproc.para: The bunk fluorescent light assembly is designed to provide the main source of illumination in the sleeper. Two additional switches are provided, one in the bunk control panel and one in the dash panel. A reading light is located in each of the two sleeper bunks to provide illumination for reading when the fluorescent lamp is turned off, or when additional light is needed.
